Talk_0010_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_01>Is that you again? <sp:5:0:0>Are you here to watch
the monster-control crew at work?
Talk_1052:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Oh, are you interested in that weapon?
Feel free to take it. I don't mind at all.<sp:0:4:0>We seized it from the monsters,<sp:5:0:0> and I
repaired it just to keep myself busy. But I
don't have a use for it.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Your travels take you through dangerous
places, I expect. <sp:5:0:0>By all means, take it if
you need it.
Talk_0010_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_01>You're that traveler I met before, right?<sp:5:0:0>
Probably don't need me to tell you to be
careful on the roads at night.
Talk_0051:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_01>All the equipment you see here is well
maintained and combat ready, but...
Talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Captain Hoz's squad of the monster-
control crew is engaged in a battle to
quell the monsters near here.
<snd:TalkPositive_01>The fighting should be in full swing at
<clr:0000>Fort Hateno <clr:ffff>down the road to the <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff> by
now, so I advise keeping your distance.
Talk_0010_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_01>Hi there. <sp:5:0:0>Some weather we're having, eh?
Nothing but gray and murk. <sp:5:1:0>Not that I
notice much, with my nose in my work.
Talk_1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>If you're curious how the battle is going,
you could go watch. But take care you
don't get caught up in the fray.
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting>Sorry, I'm a little preoccupied to deal
with travelers right now. <sp:5:1:0>That's what you
are, right? A traveler?
Talk_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>By the way, you wouldn't happen to need
any equipment, would you?<sp:0:4:0>There's some gear seized from monsters
left over. I've fixed it up as good as I can
get it, so it's yours if you want.
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>It isn't safe here. <clr:0000>Captain Hoz's squad of
the monster-control crew <clr:ffff>is going to
engage the monsters around here soon.<sp:0:4:0>I bet you by now, they're already locked
in combat with the monsters at the <clr:0000>lair<clr:ffff>
to the <clr:0000>south<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think_01>I'm not going to stop you if you want to
go watch the sparks fly, but at least take
some precautions first.
Talk_1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>I wondered if that monster-control crew
bunch had it in them, but they look more
like proper soldiers now.<sp:0:4:0>And they understand the importance of
well-maintained equipment, so they show
me a little more appreciation.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>If they keep shaping up like this, I bet it
won't be long before they clear out all the
monsters from Hyrule.
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Say, you wouldn't happen to be having
any equipment troubles, would you?<sp:0:4:0>The gear I've got laid out here is all
repaired and ready to use, but...
Talk_0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_01>Is that you again? <sp:5:0:0>I appreciate a traveler
who gets right up and at 'em!
Talk_1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>That monster-control crew bunch has
toughened up considerably.<sp:0:4:0>They're taking better care of the gear
I maintain for them too. Which is nice,
since it makes my job easier.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>They still carry farm tools into battle,
mind you, but whatever helps them keep
the peace is OK by me.
Talk_0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>The monster-control crew has a lot of
amateurs who never really learned how
to swing a sword.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sigh>They say they're more comfortable with
their farm tools, so they left all my nice
and shiny gear behind.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>From what I've seen, you'd be better
suited to use this stuff than that bunch.<sp:0:4:0>Take it with my blessing, and give the
monsters one for me, all right?
Talk_0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>The monster-control crew has a lot of
amateurs who never really learned how
to swing a sword.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>It'd help them out if <clr:0000>someone with more
experience fighting monsters<clr:ffff> would
pitch in.
